name: @json-api/query-parser
description: A query parser for the ?filter and ?sort param syntax used by @json-api/server

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:parser && npm run build:ts
scripts.test: npm run build:parser && npm run test:built
scripts.prepare: npm run build && cpr src/parser.js build/src/parser.js && cpr src/parser.d.ts build/src/parser.d.ts
